Please do not be put off by these comments about the quality because its absolutely fine, the sample looks pretty good its like all ppv rips, I think these ppl are expecting dvd quality! It's a bit granny like a vhs what most pay per view rips are like.

My advise:  download the sample first and try that before you are disappointed

NOOOOOOO!  The quality is hideous!  I mean, you can watch the film, but the video quality -  which is really one of the most important aspects of this film - is really quite fuzzy.  PLEASE BE PATIENT AND WAIT FOR A PROPER DVD RIP: the USA BluRay release date is 11 October (I contacted Amazon.com and they said they have no information on a regular DVD release in the USA); at British Amazon, both regular DVD and BluRay are scheduled for 31 October; at German Amazon, the date for both formats is 10 November.

Pretty low quality rip. Looks like you're watching it on an old SDTV through an aerial antenna during a lightning storm. This would be ok for a lot of movies, but this movie has too many important visuals to watch in this quality. Nice try though. Glad to see this movie has not been forgotten.
